message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose a price of $18000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $14000 at this time.  What do you think?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding your current budget constraints. To accommodate your situation, I am willing to negotiate the price down to $16000 for the product. This still reflects its value and benefits, while making it more accessible to you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $16000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $15500.  This is my absolute top limit, considering I have other options.

I understand your position, Bob. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am willing to set the price for the product at $15750. This price still reflects the product's value and benefits, while being more flexible for your budget.
